'''Ramon Tikaram''' (born 16 May 1967) is a British actor of Indo-Fijian and Malaysian descent. He is best known for his recurring roles on British drama series ''[[wikipedia:This Life|This Life]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:EastEnders|EastEnders]]'', but has appeared in numerous films, TV shows and on stage. He will be voicing Dorian, in the upcoming video game Dragon Age: Inquisition.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Prendahl na Ghezn]]. He was announced in the role on 18 August 2012.<ref>[http://www.westeros.org/GoT/News/Entry/Two_More_for_S3_Ramon_Tikaram_Dan_Hildebrand_Join_Cast/ Westeros.org]</ref>
